root.message: The REG_AGG field for indicator 15-6-1, translated into en
root.data: For CBD ABSCLRHS and ER_CBD_NAGOYA, regional aggregations can be generated using the appropriate filters on the Access and Benefit-sharing Clearing-House Country Profiles page. These filters follow UN regional groupings. ER_CBD_PTYPGRFA, ER_CBD_ORSPGRFA and ER_CBD_SMTA, regionally aggregated data are provided every year as required by the UN SDG indicator reporting.
